version_description:
- Fix that songs in iCloud may be shown unexpectedly
- Fix crashes on deleting imported songs
- Improve display contents of Album screen
- Show artist name for each song, if the album is compilation
- Show genre and released year if possible
Have a great holiday!

- Add Simplified Chinese support
- Add "Genres" screens
- Add "Up Next" screen
- Avoid repeatedly showing the message that request permission for Music Library
- Improve management for compilation albums

- Apple Watch app now can play album as "In Order"
- Fix that search results may be duplicated
- Fix some missing localizations

- Improved the UI so that you can check each set value of EQ
- On importing from iCloud, multiple files can be selected.
- Multiple file selection can only be used with iOS 11 and iCloud Drive

- Show larger artworks
- Improve performance
- Improve UI
- Improve AudioSession management

- Introduce `Theme` (Selectable Color)
- Add MC Options (“Skip Duplicate Artist" / "Use Album Artist”)
- Faster launch
- Stability Improvements
Fix the issue that artwork of some FLAC files were not shown

・Introduced new Reverb Effect option
・Supported CarPlay
・Supported Traditional Chinese localization
・Added “Go to Artist” / “Go to Album” menu in player screen
- Fix crashes on opening popover view on iPad

・Fix the issue that repeat did not work when only 1 song in queue
・Possible fix for the crash on top screen
・Fix compatibility issue with older watchOS versions
Fix the crash on the upcoming OS version

・Support latest complications for watchOS
・Fix some issues
